allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Enrich staff_members: skills, contracts, end-season integration

- Add 9 columns to staff_members \(note, potential_min/max/final, potential_revealed, birth_year, contract_years_remaining, years_in_team, is_retiring\)
- Create StarRating component with interactive and read-only modes
- Update staff form with competences and contract sections
- Enrich staff cards with star ratings, age, and contract badges
- Add staff contract decrements to end-season wizard
- Show staff contract status in end-season contracts tab and validation recap
- Include other pending changes \(regulations, sponsor objectives, calculations, etc.\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
